Key Arguments: The legislation creates an independent governing body to censor or decide what is information and what is disinformation.
The government is exempt from the legislation, which is seen as problematic.
The legislation poses a threat to freedom of speech.
The legislation could lead to a shift towards communism and away from democracy.
Notable Quotes: I hold very close the ability to have freedom of speech and bringing this legislation in only opens the door further for communism and closing the door on democracy which this country has always stood by.
